name: THE VANGUARD GROUP, INC.
sampleDescriptions: Dodd-Frank regulations - systemic risk, FSOC, SIFI issues;  Mutual Fund, ETF, Money Market Fund, and securities issues; Financial Choice Act; electronic delivery of shareholder reports; H.R. 4061, FSO
